common.tagline: Free tools. Local processing. No upload.
common.dropFiles: Drop files here or click to browse
common.invalidRanges: No valid page ranges found. Use format: 1-3, 5, 7-10
common.metadataRemoved: All metadata (EXIF, GPS, camera info) has been removed.
common.alreadyOptimized: No size reduction (file is already optimized)
common.splitError: An error occurred while splitting the PDF.
common.compressPdfError: Could not compress the PDF file.
common.pdfRenderError: Could not render PDF pages to images.
common.extractTextError: Could not extract text from this PDF.

landing.title: NadoTools — Free Online File Tools
landing.description: Free online tools for file conversion, PDF editing, and image processing. Everything runs locally in your browser.
landing.hero: Your files. Your device. No upload.
landing.heroSub: Free online tools for file conversion, PDF editing, and image processing. Everything runs locally in your browser.
landing.convertSectionSub: Convert between video, audio, image, and document formats directly in your browser.
landing.pdfSectionSub: Merge, split, compress, and transform PDF documents without uploading a single file.
landing.imageSectionSub: Process and optimize your images with privacy-first tools that run entirely on your device.
landing.howItWorksTitle: How does it work without uploading?
landing.howItWorksStep1Title: Your files stay on your device
landing.howItWorksStep1Desc: When you drop a file, it never leaves your browser. There is no server — processing happens right here, on your computer.
landing.howItWorksStep2Title: The tools run inside your browser
landing.howItWorksStep2Desc: We use WebAssembly — a technology that lets programs run in your browser at near-native speed, without installing anything.
landing.howItWorksStep3Desc: All code is public on GitHub. Anyone can check exactly what happens with your files.
